body.name: KAMIWI TV Wall Mount for Most 12-55 Inch TV, Universal Smart TV Holder with Max VESA 400x400mm up to 100lbs, Low Profile Space-Saving Easy Install TV Bracket
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 7 mins
features: [Universal Compatibility] TV wall mount is designed to fit most 12-55 inch TVs from popular brands like LG, Sony, Vizio, Panasonic, Toshiba, Sharp, and Philips, and supports VESA patterns ranging from 100x100 to 400x400, which means that regardless of the brand or size of your TV, smart tv wall mount is the perfect choice for a hassle-free installation.

[Heavy-duty Support] Wall tv mount is made from heavy-duty electroplated alloy and can support up to 100lbs, ensuring a safe and secure installation for your TV. With this kind of support, you can be confident that your TV will remain stable and secure on the wall, reducing the risk of damage to your screen.

[Space-saving Design] With a low-profile design, our wall mount brings your TV just 1.2 inches closer to the wall, creating a sleek and modern look while also saving valuable floor space, which is perfect for those who want to create a minimalist and stylish home entertainment setup.

[Fast and Easy Installation] TV wall mount comes with all the necessary mounting hardware and an English graphical installation guide that is easy to understand, making installation a breeze. With our easy-to-follow instructions and simple installation process, you can have your TV mounted in just 10 minutes.

[Customer Service] We stand behind our product and offer a peace of mind guarantee. If for any reason you are not satisfied with our TV wall mount, we will give you a full refund . Additionally, we offer a 5-year warranty on all of our products, ensuring that you can enjoy your home entertainment setup worry-free for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TV wall bracket
reviews.reviewText: Can't say enough on what a wonderful TV wall Bracket this is. Easy to put up, worked like a charm!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: Using this for our 65 in tv

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and easy
reviews.reviewText: Great wall mount at a great price! Very easy to install! If you are looking for a mount that is almost flush to the wall this is it. I would recommend installing any cables you need or may use later before hanging TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller mount is too small for 16" studs
reviews.reviewText: The 17" bracket for the smaller size mount (fits 12 -55" tvs) is too small for studs spaced 16" apart. The product description is misleading in this respect. I went ahead and sunk one screw into a stud and used the supplied plastic dry wall anchors for the other three. At 40 pounds, my tv is well under the 100 pound weight limit.; so I am reasonably confident that absent major seismic or other abuse, this mount will work for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job well
reviews.reviewText: We have a 60” tv that is about 70 pounds. The mount that was originally installed was quite heavy itself and caused the tv to stick out of the wall at least 6 inches and hang at an angle.Took forever taking the old one down due to the 6 heavy duty screws in the studs. Broke my wrench getting one of those screws out.This one installed in a jiffy and is so much better. It’s light weight but unlike the other ones that just nail into dry wall, I was able to screw into the studs and am more confident it will hold the heavy tv.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Item was delivered as described in a timely manner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Specs say “Fits for 16” – 18” wood studs” - NOT TRUE!!
reviews.reviewText: Be warned... The length of the wall bracket is 17.5” so it will NOT work for studs that are spaced at 18” as clearly stated several places. I saw the product dimensions listed in the specs (17.6 x 2.2 x 1.81 inches) and I should never have placed the order because I have studs that are spaced at 18" - I don't know what came over me! My bad!. Now I have to go through the return process. I don't like giving a bad review because for a person who has studs spaced at 16" or less, this product would work well I'm sure. It appears to be a high-quality product. But false advertising does not sit well with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, no need for top and bottom bolts or screws. i've been mounting tv's & screens for a long time and i love the simplicity of this mount, makes it easier to remove and cover any holes if you ever need to remove from wall and cover up....
